modules.name: Vulkan
modules.description: Vulkan is a new generation graphics and compute API that provides high-efficiency, cross-platform access to modern GPUs used in a wide variety of devices from PCs and consoles to mobile phones and embedded platforms.

modules.name: Vulkan Memory Allocator
modules.description: Vulkan Memory Allocator (VMA) is an easy to integrate library that help game developers to manage memory allocations and resource creation.

modules.name: GLFW
modules.description: GLFW is an Open Source, multi-platform library for OpenGL, OpenGL ES and Vulkan development on the desktop. It provides a simple API for creating windows, contexts and surfaces, receiving input and events.

modules.name: OpenGL
modules.description: The industry's foundation for high performance graphics, from games to virtual reality, mobile phones to supercomputers.

modules.name: OpenAL
modules.description: OpenAL is a cross-platform 3D audio API appropriate for use with gaming applications and many other types of audio applications.

modules.name: STB
modules.description: STB is a collection of single-file public domain libraries for C/C++ that provide various utilities such as image loading, font rendering, and more.

modules.name: OpenCL
modules.description: OpenCL is the ultimate standard for cross-platform parallel programming on any hardware.

modules.name: OpenGL ES 2.0 Only
modules.description: OpenGL ES is royalty-free, cross-platform API for full-function 2D and 3D graphics on embedded systems - including consoles, phones, appliances and vehicles. It consists of well-defined subsets of desktop OpenGL, creating a flexible and powerful low-level interface between software and graphics acceleration.

modules.name: SDL3
modules.description: Simple DirectMedia Layer is a cross-platform development library designed to provide low level access to audio, keyboard, mouse, joystick, and graphics hardware via OpenGL and Direct3D.

modules.name: OpenXR
modules.description: OpenXR is a royalty-free, open standard that provides a common set of APIs for developing XR applications that run across a wide range of AR and VR devices.

modules.name: WebGPU Native
modules.description: WebGPU is an API that exposes the capabilities of GPU hardware for the Web.
